## Checklist

### General

- [ ] I have read the [CONTRIBUTING](../CONTRIBUTING.md) guidelines
- [ ] My code follows the project's style guidelines
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my own code
- [ ] I have commented my code where necessary
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings or errors

### For New Questions

- [ ] Question ID is unique and sequential
- [ ] Slug is unique and in kebab-case
- [ ] Frontmatter YAML is valid
- [ ] Both FR and EN versions are provided
- [ ] Code examples are tested and working
- [ ] Difficulty level is appropriate
- [ ] Tags are lowercase and relevant
- [ ] Content is well-structured with proper markdown
- [ ] No spelling or grammar errors

### Testing

- [ ] I have tested my changes locally (`npm run dev`)
- [ ] Type checking passes (`npm run typecheck`)
- [ ] Linting passes (`npm run lint`)
- [ ] Build succeeds (`npm run generate`)

### Documentation

- [ ] I have updated documentation (if applicable)
- [ ] README is updated (if feature adds new functionality)

## For Reviewers

<!-- Reviewers can use this section for notes -->

### Review Checklist

- [ ] Code quality and style
- [ ] Functionality works as expected
- [ ] Documentation is clear and complete
- [ ] Tests are adequate (when applicable)
- [ ] No breaking changes (or properly documented)
